com.quantcomponents.core.calendar
Interface ITradingPeriod

All Known Implementing Classes:
TradingPeriodBean
public interface ITradingPeriod

Specification of an uninterrupted trading period, in terms of hour and minute based in the relevant calendar's time zone

Method Summary
 boolean contains(int hour, int minute)
          Utility method to check if a specific hour-minute instant is included in the period
 int getEndHour()
           
 int getEndMinute()
           
 int getStartHour()

Method Detail

getStartHour

int getStartHour()
Returns:
the starting hour of this trading period

getStartMinute

int getStartMinute()
Returns:
the starting minute of this trading period

getEndHour

int getEndHour()
Returns:
the end hour of this trading period: i.e. the hour when the period ends

getEndMinute

int getEndMinute()
Returns:
the end minute of this trading period: i.e. the first minute after the period ends

contains

boolean contains(int hour,
                 int minute)
Utility method to check if a specific hour-minute instant is included in the period

Parameters:
hour - an hour value
minute - a minute value
Returns:
true if the instant defined by the input values is included in this trading period, false otherwise
